document.full_text: rambus inc has agreed to let toshiba corp license its memory chip controller patents another five years, renewing an existing pact and sending rambus' shares soaring.
document.title: rambus, toshiba ink memory chip deal, shares surge
lines_and_colors: rambus inc has agreed to let toshiba corp license its memory chip controller patents another five years, renewing an existing pact and sending rambus' shares soaring.
